content: pattern is written using us and uk terminology materials ● dk yarn approximately 20g i m using knitting essentials gorgeous baby 327080 ● 5mm hook ● scissors ● a yarn needle gauge ● not important pattern notes ● pattern is written in us and uk starts on page 5 terminology ● i have not included a stitch count at the end of each round because it doesn t matter if you miss a few increases or add a few extra increases us terminology chain 15 row 1 turn and single_crochet 14 put the ends together as if to join twist the end and join with a single_crochet place stitch marker in single_crochet round 1 half_double_crochet in the same stitch as the single_crochet hdc2 in every stitch round 2 hdc2 in every stitch round 3 hdc2 in every stitch round 4 *hdc2 hdc1 in the next stitch repeat from * to end when you reach the end of the round 4 sc1 in to the first stitch of the next round slip_stitch in to the next stitch cut yarn and weave in ends tag me in your photos on instagram @littleknittedknots © little knitted knots 2023 this pattern is for personal use only and may not be distributed or sold without written consent uk terminology ch15 row 1 turn and double_crochet 14 put the ends together as if to join twist the end and join with a double_crochet place stitch marker in double_crochet round 1 half_double_crochet in the same stitch as the double_crochet htr2 in every stitch round 2 htr2 in every stitch round 3 htr2 in every stitch round 4 *htr2 htr1 in the next stitch repeat from * to the end when you reach the end of the round 4 dc1 in to the first stitch of the next round slip_stitch in to the next stitch cut yarn and weave in ends tag me in your photos on instagram @littleknittedknots © little knitted knots 2023 this pattern is for personal use only and may not be distributed or sold without written consent
